metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12216 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libSDL2.a in Simple DirectMedia Layer (SDL)2.0.9 when used in conjunction with libSDL2_image.a in SDL2_image 2.0.4.There is a heap-based buffer overflow in the SDL2_image functionIMG_LoadPCX_RW at IMG_pcx.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12216` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsdl-image1.2 - 1.2.12-8ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsdl2-image package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
sdl-image1.2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.12-8ubuntu0.1').
